'''Rollo Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Rollo was the son of [[Otto Boffin]] and [[Lavender Grubb]]. He married [[Druda Burrows]] and had various descendants.<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
